Campus Innovation Initiative Receives Major Funding

By Sarah Johnson • July 15, 2025

The university has announced a groundbreaking $2.3 million grant to support innovative student projects and research initiatives across all departments. This funding represents the largest single investment in student-led innovation in the institution's history.

The initiative will support up to 15 different projects over the next academic year, with a focus on sustainable technology, social impact, and interdisciplinary collaboration. Applications are now open for all enrolled students.
